Children.style: width: 256px; height: 48px; transform: translate(0px, 0px); color: rgb(255, 255, 255); background-color: rgb(87, 87, 87); border-radius: 0px; white-space: pre; background-image: none; justify-content: left; text-align: left; font-family: system-ui;

width: 256px; height: 48px; transform: translate(0px, 48px); color: rgb(255, 255, 255); background-color: rgb(112, 112, 112); border-radius: 0px; white-space: pre; background-image: none; justify-content: left; text-align: left;

width: 256px; height: 48px; transform: translate(0px, 96px); color: rgb(255, 255, 255); background-color: rgb(87, 87, 87); border-radius: 0px; white-space: pre; background-image: none; justify-content: left; text-align: left; font-family: system-ui;
